info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The Scatter Plot component creates a scatter plot of the input data. Use a tab-delimited file with column headers as input. The options are contained in the html output file.
info.inputs: tab-delimited - Must have column headers in the first row.
info.outputs:
Scatter Plot html file
Original Input Data File - unmodified
